name: Early Alpha - Alternative Collecting
description:
Early Alpha - Alternative Collecting

This is an early alpha playtesting version for Alternative Collecting - a heist game about a little raccoon stealing from houses.

Alternative Collecting is a turn-based heist inventory management game! Steal expensive items, balance your inventory space, and avoid setting off alarms!

Use the mouse and keyboard!

Join my Discord Server! Please let me know if you have any feedback about any aspect of the game. I want to expand this game further and need your feedback! If you are interested in further development, please join us!
